definitions: a deformed foot that is twisted so that the sole cannot be placed flat on the ground. It is typically congenital or a result of polio.
shortDefinitions: deformed foot which is twisted so that sole cannot be placed flat on ground

definitions: a woodland toadstool with a grayish-brown cap, primrose-yellow gills, and a stem with a swollen woolly base, found in both Eurasia and North America.

notes.text: Clitocybe clavipes, family Tricholomataceae, class Basidiomycetes

shortDefinitions: woodland toadstool with greyish-brown cap, pale yellow gills
